articles.author: THE ASSOCIATED PRESS
articles.title: What's open and closed on Memorial Day? Grocery stores, banks and Costco - The Associated Press
articles.description: In what had long been celebrated every May 30 to honor America’s fallen soldiers, Memorial Day officially became a federal holiday in 1971, observed on the last Monday in May. Businesses increasingly have chosen to stay open on the holiday, leading to what is…
articles.content:
In what had long been celebrated every May 30 to honor Americas fallen soldiers, Memorial Day officially became a federal holiday in 1971, observed on the last Monday in May.
